Relationships.Reason: Leonardo Da Vinci was born at the little town of Vinci.
Leonardo Da Vinci was the son of Ser Piero.
Leonardo Da Vinci's mother was one Caterina.
Caterina married Accabriga di Piero del Vaccha.
The painting 'Annunciation' is probably by his master, Verrocchio.
Annunciation is included in the Uffizi Gallery's catalogue.
Leonardo Da Vinci...was born, as his name implies, at the little town of Vinci...
was the natural and first-born son of Ser Piero, a country notary...
who afterwards married Accabriga di Piero del Vaccha of Vinci.
this panel is included in the Uffizi Catalogue as being by Leonardo, it is in all probability by his master, Verrocchio.
His age is given as five in a taxation return made in 1457 by his grandfather Antonio, in whose house he was educated...
